data.text: The Ramada is primarily a medical tourist or business hotel and as such not many of us tourists per say.  The standard of cleanliness in the hotel is excellent, check in was easy and pleasant, facilities are great.  The walls between the rooms however are paper thin take air plugs so you don't hear everything.  We also found the restaurant service non-existant however the food was OK.  There was an obvious difference in service  (or lack of) towards tourists, would not recommend eating there.
data.title: Wouldn't go back

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,

Thank you for taking the time to review your experience. We are very happy to see that you left our facility satisfied. Your feedback will help us make our business better. Thank you for choosing Ramada Plaza By Wyndham Izmir. We hope to host you again, and offer our love and respect.

Ramada Plaza By Wyndham Izmir

Lamya LATIFI

gr@ramadaplazaizmir.com
owner_response.author: Lamia LATIFI

data.text:
I stayed at this hotel for three nights with my husband and it was not a good experience.
1- The hotel management did not treat the passengers with respect and sincerity, and even though the breakfast time was not over, they warned us that you should leave the restaurant at 10 o'clock.
1- The room key card did not work and we changed it several times.
2- Water was collecting on the floor of the bathroom and it had a very bad2outlet.
3-The ventilation of the room was inadequate
4-The breakfast of the hotel was very small and lacked variety.
5-There were no necessary items such as toothbrush, toothpaste, paper towels in the room
6-The bathroom water in our room was broken and the toilet was not working properly
And finally, we definitely recommend this hotel and I will not go to this hotel on my next trip.
data.title: Things you should know about this hotel

owner_response.text:
Dear Noemie,

Thank you for your feedback but after examinating the picture posted and your review, i am afraid to tell you that you've mistaken the hotel, because we don't have any room with  number 218, and the picture posted do not look like our room. so i ask you kindly to delete your review 

Thank you for your comprehension
owner_response.author: Lamia LATIFI

data.text: The location is good, close enough to the center. The room is clean, comfy beds and the bathroom offers enough room. The breakfast is average but offers a good selection. The dinner we had was a buffet-kind with almost no variety plus we ordered a couple of glasses of wine that they forgot to bring to our table.
data.title: Good value for money, average food
